description: Updates the status for the specified job. Use this operation to confirm that you want to run a job or to cancel an existing job. For more information, see S3 Batch Operations in the Amazon S3 User Guide. To use the UpdateJobStatus operation, you must have permission to perform the s3:UpdateJobStatus action. Related actions include:

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the S3 Batch Operations job.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job whose status you want to update.

parameters.name: RequestedJobStatus
parameters.description: The status that you want to move the specified job to.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The ID for the job whose status was updated.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status for the specified job.

nested_items.name: StatusUpdateReason
nested_items.description: The reason that the specified job's status was updated.
